name: Faithful Guardian Aviation Flight School
about: Faithful Guardian Aviation Flight School, located in Temple, GA, offers FAA-approved 141/61 flight training programs with 45 years of experience. Our highly trained staff, including Director of Aviation Lyndon Lamott, an ATP-rated pilot with extensive instruction experience, ensure safe and effective instruction. We support veterans with VA-approved training and offer financing options, scholarships, and pay-as-you-go programs. Our courses include Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Instrument Rating, and more, all taught by certified flight instructors. We prioritize safety and provide a positive learning environment, making us an ideal choice for aspiring pilots. Faithful Guardian Aviation is committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
services:
["Private Pilot Training
Commercial Pilot Training
Advance Training
Instrument Rating Training
CFI Training
Biannual Flight Review
IPC Check"]
